summary: Revel in the power of blood...
descriptionHtml:
This is my first mod so tell me how i did.
If you enjoy blood magic then you might like this mod.
I made several blood spells for use with blood mage characters.

They all use the \"Drain Life\" spell animation and are all Novice level because I don\'t know how to change that in CK. If you can offer any ideas then please let me know. I would post screenshots but they are all messed up, unfortunately.

The spells include:

Boil Blood
Boil the blood of your foes so they burst into flames and then drain them dry.

Blood Freeze
Freeze the blood of your enemies and cause their veins to crack then drain their blood.

Shocking Blood
Use an enemies own blood to electrocute them as you drain their blood.

Blood Sap
Drain a small amount of blood from your foes.

Blood Drain
Drain blood from your foes.

Blood Vacuum
Steal massive amounts of blood from your foes.

INSTALL
Just drop the files into your Data Folder.

UNINSTALL
Just take them back out.

Also, if you want a Blood Mage Class then I recommend this mod by phorgotten99
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3405
author: kaiger1
